full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSANGS KYI CHO GA DNGOS GRUB KYI GZI 'OD 'BAR BA DAM TSIG RIN PO CHE'I 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @023A *, ,CES BSANGS KYI CHO GA DNGOS GRUB KYI 'BAR BA NGO MTSAR RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RIGS RUS CHO 'BRANG SOGS YON TAN DU MA'I DPAL GYIS MNGON PAR THO ZHANG, KHYAD PAR RGYAL GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA BSTAN 'DZIN LA MI 'PHYED PA'I DANG PA DANG LDAN PA, RNAM PAR 'PHYED PA'I MIG YANGS GA-YOS SIM BYA'I DKYIL 'KHOR MTHA' DAG LA GZIGS PA GSAL BA SOGS, DAM PA'I SNGAGS PA'I YON TAN DANG LDAN PA, LCANG RAMS SDE PA RIN PO CHE DON GRUB RAB BRTAN SKU MCHED KYI BKAM BSKUL BA LA RTEN NAS, SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, ,DPAL 'BYOR BDE CHEN DU SBYAR BA 'DI KYANG, PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DGE BAR @023B GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAM BHA WANTU, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
